attributes.action: Provide ID cards for people aged 12 up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government wishes to enforce a law that stipulates that persons of a certain age are not allowed to by forms of media, then that is fine. What isn't is then making people have to purchase a card to be allowed to purchase age restricted media. This petition is asking the government to provide free ID cards to people aged 12 or over. it is unfair to have to pay for an ID card to be able to pay for media.
